Father, we love you this evening. We thank you for loving us. Thank you for the word of God. Thank you for these attributes. Help us, Lord, to declare your greatness. Bless our time of prayer. We do thank you for the privilege of prayer. We thank you that you're a God who hears and answers prayer. I pray that you'd bless the remainder of our time for it's in Christ's name we pray, amen. Does anyone need a prayer bullet?
